Topic.Title: The server falls down for all the time - Error 523

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

Maybe, you could help me with this situation.

I'm trying to play games on this site, but they always crashes (games doesn't react on commands) and browser shows, that there is a problem on the side of the server (Error 523).

Am I only one with this kind of problem, or anyone else struggles with it too?

Thanks!

Posts.EditableText: I think that's just because the server is overloaded. You might have more luck trying a little later.
